about_the_game:
Rustic Defense is a hexagonal fantasy tower defense game with roguelike elements, generated enviroment with option explore your own way.

Turrets

Like in classic tower defense game, you build turrets that fight with incoming enemies.
You can research 15 types of turrets that belong to five categories (archery, natural, guns, throwing, splash). Every turret has physical damage, advanced turrets adds elemental damage bonus (fire, poison, ice) and special attack feature. Elemental damage rise overtime damage or slowing monsters. 

These turrets you can research on carddeck during game and then build for gold from enemies.

Enemies

Enemies incoming from four bioms. The Valley is nearest and enemies haven't any armor. Mountains, Desert and Swamp monsters has armor with resistances to elemental attack (e.g. enemies from Mountains can be slowed from ice damage only by 25% or monsters from Swamp can be poisoned by 25% too).

There are bosses and special units with bonus too.

Map

Map and enviroment is randomly generated. After each wave you can choose way that you want to explore. For example you can reach Desert biom in fifth wave and face different enemy than in wave twenty. Enviroment like higher grounds or rocks with gold (if you have goldmine researched) give you benefit and vice versa sand or swamp areas has only few places where you can build turret.

Progress

After every game you obtain experiences depends on reached wave. Those experiences you can convert to skills in skill tree, that give you advantage for rest of game.

Skills are passive (permament) and active, that you can choose during game on carddeck.
If you have more skills and feel confident, you can choose two or three way game and earn more experience. In late game you can research speciality like support from sea or chance to deal epic card that can change game.
